titleStmt.title: Menaion for October, National Library, Sofia, No. 518, 13th-14th c.
titleStmt.author: Radoslava Stankova

availability.p: The intellectual content of this file is copyrighted by the creators under the Creative Commons Attribution-No Derivative Works 3.0 under legislation in Bulgaria. In short, you could download and disseminate information, but you are not allowed to alter, transform, or build upon the works on this section of the site. All reuse or distribution of this work must contain somewhere a link back to the URL http://www.ilit.bas.bg/repertorium/

prefixDef.p: In the context of this project, private URIs with the prefix "bib" point to bibl elements in the project's bib.xml file.

revisionDesc.change: Addition of notBefore and notAfter attributes in element <origDate>
Conversion to Repertorium 4.0; original text addition
Edition of the scheme; Checked against the MS; original text addition

collation.signatures: Original, in the lower left-hand corner

supportDesc.condition: Some folia appear to be missing between ff. 2 and 7 in Quire 1, f. 8. in Quire 2, and 5 folia in Quires 6 and 12. There are some wrongly foliated leaves. The begining and the end of the Office for St. Ananias and St. Romanos the Melode are on f. 2r-2v. This Office seems to be the initiual of the MSS, because it contains the text for the 1st of October. The Office for SS. Cyprian and Justina has to be the next text, which is for the the 2nd of October.

decoDesc.p: Small red initials and the red titles in Byzantine style

binding.p: Wooden boards covered with ornamented lether

orthography.p: Serbian orthography, without juses, with ligatures; spirituses (as superscripts) and fourfulls like a rhombus

msItemStruct.title: Житие на св. Киприян и Юстина
msItemStruct.note: The text mentions the names of venerable Ananias and Romanos the Melode: there are 3 vesper stichera (mode 4), a doxa (mode 2), a dismissal troparion (mode 4), an aposticha sticheron (mode 4), a doxa (mode 3), a staurotheotokion, a dismissals troparion (mode 3) and 3 Kanons: The 1st Kanon on ff. 2r-2v is for Ananias and Romanos the Melode (mode 8) and contains only ode 1 (with a heirmos, 4 troparia and a theotokion), ode 3 (with a heirmos, 3 troparia and a theotokion), because there are 6 folia missing in the 1st quire. Presumably, there should be another 2 Kanons for Ananias (mode 8 and 6), as it's marked in the heading. The Office for SS. Cyprian and Justina is on ff. 1r, 1v and ff. 3r-4v with 3 vesper stichera (mode 4), a doxa (mode 2) and a dismissal troparion (mode 4). The content of the Kanon (mode 4) in this Office: ode 1 (with a heirmos, 2 troparia and a theotokion), odes 3 and 4 are missing; odes 5 and 6 have a heirmos, 4 troparia, since two saints are commemorated, and a theotokion, a kondakion (mode 1), and an oikos; odes 7 and 8 are on on f. 3v, and ode 9 is on ff. 4r-4v; the Office ends with a ligthing troparion and a doxa (mode 8).

sampleText.head: Мсца тогожде. в҃. с҃тыих. мчнык кѵприана. и ѹстини.
два канѡн апслѹ. имыи краѥгранес сице. Анании слав прославит' се
sampleText.incipit: Ѿврьзѣ оуста похвалнаꙗ. уꙗснимь ѥзыкь вь памет все вѣрныи

sampleText.head: дроугканѡн прѣподбномоу глас .ѕ҃.
sampleText.incipit: Свѣтовидениѥ луче. ѿ н҃бсь ньмь низьпошли

msItemStruct.title: Служба за св. Дионисий Ареопагит
msItemStruct.note: The text includes: 3 vesper stichera (mode 1), a doxa (mode 2), a staurotheotokion, stichera aposticha and a doxa (mode 4), a dismissal troparion (mode 4); the Kanon (mode 8) has odes 1 and 3 (with a heirmos, 3 troparia, and a theotokion), a sjedalen (mode 8), the ode 4 is missing, there are odes 5 and 6, a kontakion (mode 8), an oikos, and odes 7, 8, 9 followed by a lighting troparion, a doxa (mode 8)and a staurotheotokion

sampleText.head: Мсца тогож .г҃. дь҃ ст҃го свщ҃нно мчнка Диѡнисиꙗ Ареѡпагита.

msItemStruct.title: Служба за св. Йеротей Атински
msItemStruct.note: Includеs: 3 vesper stichera (mode 4), the doxa and the dismissal troparion are missing; the Кanon (mode 8) has ode 1 (with a heirmos, 3 troparia and a theotokion), ode 3, a sjedalen (mode 6), only the heirmos of ode 4, because there are missing the odes 5 and 6, a kontakion and an oikos, odes 7, 8, 9 follow on f. 9v, as well as a lighting troparion, a staurotheotokion and a doxa (mode 3)

sampleText.head: Мсца тогод. д҃. ст҃го св҃щномьчыка Ѥротѣꙗ.

msItemStruct.title: Служба за св. Харитина
msItemStruct.note: Includes: 3 vesper stichera (mode 4), a doxa and a staurotheothokion; the Kanon (mode 4) has all the odes (from 1 to 6, with a heirmos, 3 troparia and a theotokion; odes 7, 8, 9 kave 4 troparia each, apart from the heirmos and the theotokion), a sjedalen (mode 4) after ode 3, there no kontakion and oikos after ode 6); in the end there are a lighting sticheron, stichera on the praises and a doxa.

sampleText.head: Мсца тогож. е҃. ст҃ыѥ мчнце Харитины.
канѡн. имы накростих се. Харитоныи блгдть вьспѣваю любовию.
sampleText.incipit: Твоими ѡ харитоныи дарови. оумь ми ѡблагдти

msItemStruct.title: Служба за апостол Тома
msItemStruct.note: Includеs: 3 vesper stichera (mode 4), a doxa (mode 6), a staurotheothokion, stichera aposticha and a doxa (mode 6), a dismissal troparion (mode 3); the Kanon (mode 4) has all the odes (with a heirmos, 3 troparia and a theotokion), a sjedalen (mode 8) after ode 3, a kontakion (mode 4) and an oikos after ode 6; in the end there are a lighting sticheron, 3 praises stichera (1st - mode 1, 2nd and 3rd - mode 4), 2 doxas (mode 6) and a staurotheothokion

sampleText.head: Мсца тог. вь. ѕ҃. ст҃го апсла ѳомы.

sampleText.incipit: Триста ти крѣпкы рождеи се ѿ д҃вы
Безначлна с҃на б҃жиꙗ. б҃а слова ꙗвльшаго се на земли

msItemStruct.title: Служба за св. Сергий и Вакх
msItemStruct.note: Includes: 3 vesper stichera (mode 6), a doxa (mode 4), stichera aposticha and a doxa (mode 8), a dismissal troparion (mode 4); the Kanon (mode 1) has all the odes. The odes 1, 4, 8 and 9 have 4 troparia each, apart from the heirmos and the theotokion. The rest of the dongs have a heirmos, 3 troparia and a theotokion; odes 1 and 3 are for St. Sergius, the other odes are for the both saints); a sjedalen (mode 8)after ode 3, a kontakion (mode 2) and an oikos after ode 6; in the end, there are a lighting sticheron, 3 stichera on the praises (mode 1), stichera aposticha and a doxa (mode 1)

sampleText.head: Мсца тогож. з҃. ст҃ыю мчныкѹ сергиꙗ и вакьха.

msItemStruct.title: Канон за св. Сергий и Вакх

sampleText.incipit: Сергиѥ ѹгодныче х҃ва. сь мчтлꙗ приѥмь

msItemStruct.title: Служба за св. Пелагия
msItemStruct.note: Includes: 3 vesper stichera (mode 8), a doxa (mode 4), a staurotheothokion, a dismissal troparion (mode 8); the Кanon (mode 4) has all the odes (with a heirmos, 3 troparia and a theotokion), a sjedalen (mode 8), a doxa and a staurotheotokion after ode 3, there are no kontakion and oikos after ode 6; in the end, there are no lighting sticheron, praises stichera and doxa.

sampleText.head: Мсца тог. и҃. прѣподные пелагиѥ.

msItemStruct.title: Служба за апостол Яков Алфеев и св. Андроник
msItemStruct.note: Includes: 3 vesper stichera (mode 4), a doxa (mode 4), a staurotheotokion and another doxa (mode 5), a dismissal troparion (mode 3) and 2 separate (in a row) Kanons: the 1st Kanon (mode 8), on ff. 25v-27v, has all the odes (with a heirmos, 3 troparia and a theotokion each), a sjedalen (mode 8) after ode 6, there are no kontakion and oikos after ode 6; in the end, there are 3 praises stichera and a doxa with a staurotheotokion; the 2nd Kanon (mode 6), on ff. 28r-30r, have, too, all the odes (with a heirmos, 3 troparia and a theotokion), a sjedalen (is't marked the mode), a doxa and a staurotheotokion after ode 3, a kontakion (mode 2) and an oikos after ode 6, as well as a lighting sticheron in the end, missing the praises stichera and the doxa.

sampleText.head: Мсца тог. вь. ѳ҃. с҃тго апсла иакова альфеꙗ. и прѣподб'наго ан'дроника
канѡн глас. и҃.
sampleText.incipit: Проѡчистившѹ ти д҃шѹ. ан'дрониче доб'лими добродѣтел'ми
Рѹкѹ ми подажд б҃говидче. и ѹчениче хсвь

msItemStruct.title: Служба за св. Евлампий и Евлампия
msItemStruct.note: Includes: 3 vesper stichera (mode 4), a doxa (mode 4), a staurotheothokion, another doxa (mode 4) in stichera aposticha, a dismissal troparion (mode 4), the Kanon (mode 4) have all the odes (the odes 1 and 9 are with a heirmos, 3 troparia and a theotokrion, the rest of the odes have, apart from the heirmos and the theotoion, 2 troparia each), a sjedalen (mode 8), a doxa and a staurotheotokion after ode 3, a kontakion (mode 3) and an oikos after ode 6; in the end, there are a lighting sticheron and a theotokion

sampleText.head: Мсца тогжде. і҃. с҃тых мчныкь елампиꙗ. и ѥлампие

msItemStruct.title: Канон за св. Евлампий и Евлампия
Служба за апостол Филип и св. Теофан Изповедник
msItemStruct.note: Includes: 3 vesper stichera (mode 4) and another 3 stichera (mode 6) for the venerable, a doxa and a staurotheothokion,a dismissal troparion (mode 8), there are the beginings of 2 mixed Kanons (mode 6), with odes 1-6 in a row (with a heirmos, 3 troparia and a theotokion each) and two sjedalni (1st - mode 8, 2nd - mode 4), a doxa and a staurotheotokion after ode 3, two kontakia (mode 4) and an oikos after ode 6; there are missing folia betwin ff. 37r - 38v and a different Kanon (odes 4-9) is following (with a heirmos, 2 troparia and a theotokion), a kontakion (mode 8) and an oikos after ode 6; in the end, there are a lighting sticheron, 3 praises stichera (mode 6) and a doxa (mode 6)

sampleText.head: Вь аі҃. с҃тго. апсла филипа ѥдиног ѿ. з҃. диꙗконь. ипрѣподбьнаго ѳеѡфн исповѣд'ника ѥппспа никеискаго
дрѹг. канѡн прѣподбнѡм

msItemStruct.title: Канон за св. Отци на Седмия събор
msItemStruct.note: The beginning of the text is missing

msItemStruct.title: Служба за св. Пров, Тарах и Андроник и Козма Маюмски
msItemStruct.note: Includes: 3 vesper stichera (mode 4) and another 3 stichera (mode 4) for the venerable, a doxa (mode 4) and a staurotheothokion, another doxa (mode 1) in stichera aposticha and a staurotheotokion, 2 dismissal troparia (1st - mode 5, 2nd - mode 8); there are 2 mixed Kanons: The 1st Kanon (mode 6) is for the martyrs and the 2th Kanon (mode 4) is for the venerable, with all the odes in a row (in the 1st Kanon odes 1, 3, 4, 7 and 9 have 4 troparia each, apart from the heirmos and the theotokion, the rest of the odes have a heirmos, 3 troparia and a theotokion each; the 2nd Kanon has all the odes with a heirmos, 3 troparia and a theotokion), there are two sjedalni (mode 8), a doxa and a staurotheotokion after ode 3, a kontakion (mode 2) and an oikos after ode 6; in the end, there are a lighting sticheron and a theotokion only

sampleText.head: Мсца тогож. ві҃. с҃тых мчныкь прова тарха андроника и прѣподбнаго ѡ҃ца н҃шего козмы. с҃тогорца. и твор'ца ѥппспа маюма.

msItemStruct.title: Канон за св. Пров, Тарах и Андроник

sampleText.head: дрѹг. канѡн прѣподбнѡмѹ

msItemStruct.title: Служба за св. Карп и Папил
msItemStruct.note: Includes: 3 vesper stichera (mode 4), a doxa (mode 6) and a staurotheothokion, the dismissal troparion is only marked in stichera aposticha; the Kanon (mode 1) has all the odes (with a heirmos, 3 troparia and theotokion each) and a sjedalen (mode 1), a doxa and a staurotheotokion after ode 3; there are no kontakion and oikos after ode 6; in the end, there are a lighting sticheron, praises stichera and a doxa.

sampleText.head: Мсца тжде. гі҃. с҃тыих мчнкь карпа и папила

msItemStruct.title: Канон за св. Карп и Папил
Служба за св. Назарий, Гервасий, Келсий и Протасий
msItemStruct.note: Includes: 6 vesper stichera (mode 4), a doxa (mode 8) and a staurotheothokion, a dismissal troparion (mode 4) in stichera aposticha; the Kanon (mode 4) has all the odes (odes 1, 3, 6, 7 have a heirmos, 3 troparia and a theotokion each, and odes 4, 5, 8 and 9 have 4 troparia each, apart from the heirmos and the theotokion; a staurotheotokion after ode 3, a kontakion (mode 3) and an oikos after ode 6; in the end, there are a lighting sticheron and a theotokion

sampleText.head: Вь ді҃. с҃тых мчнкь назареꙗ. геврасиꙗ. протасию. и керсиꙗ

msItemStruct.title: Канон за св. Назарий, Гервасий, Келсий и Протасий
Служба за св. Евтимий Нови и Лукиан Презвитер Антиохийски
msItemStruct.note: Includes: 3 vesper stichera (mode 4) and another 3 stichera (mode 4) for the martyr, a doxa (mode 6) and a staurotheothokion, another doxa (mode 5) in stichera aposticha and a staurotheotokion, a dismissal troparion (mode 8); there are 2 mixed Kanons; the 1st Kanon (mode 2) and the 2nd Kanon (mode 4) for the martyrs, with all the odes in a row (in the 1st Kanon all the odes have 3 troparia each, apart from the heirmos and the theotokion; the 2nd Kanon have all the odes with a heirmos, 3 troparia and a theotokion each, but ode 7 has only 2 troparia, exept for the heirmos and the theotokion), there are two sjedalni (mode 8), a doxa and a staurotheotokion after ode 3, a kontakion (mode 2) and oikos after ode 6 and in the end, there are a lighting sticheron, a theotokion, a doxa (mode 2) in stichera aposticha and staurotheotokion

sampleText.head: Мсца тогожде. еі҃. прѣподбнаго ѡ҃ца н҃шего ѥѵѳимиꙗ. новаго. и с҃тго прѣподбномчнка. лѹкуана предвитера. великыѥ анѳуѡхиѥ.

sampleText.incipit: Гредѣте людиѥ поѥмь пѣс хсѹ б҃ѹ

msItemStruct.title: Канон за св. Лукиан Презвитер Антиохийски

sampleText.head: дрѹг. канѡн мчнкѹ
sampleText.incipit: Воспою ти г҃и б҃е мои ꙗко провед лид своѥ по сѹх
Прѣмѹдростию и даромь д҃ховнимь. лѹкиꙗне просиꙗвь

msItemStruct.title: Служба за св. Лонгин
msItemStruct.note: Includes: 3 vesper stichera (mode 8), a doxa (mode 6), staurotheothokion and a doxa (mode 6) in stichera aposticha, the dismissal troparion (mode 4) is only marked; the Kanon (mode 4) has all the odes (with 3 troparia each, apart from the heirmos and the theotokion, odes 8 and 9 have 4 troparia each), there are a sjedalen (mode 8), a doxa and a staurotheotokion after ode 3, a kontakion (mode 4) and an oikos after ode 6; in the end, there are a lighting sticheron, a theotokion, a doxa in stichera aposticha and a staurotheotokion.

sampleText.head: Вь ѕі҃. с҃тго мчныка логина иже при крстѣ.

msItemStruct.title: Служба за пророк Осия и св. Андрей Критски
msItemStruct.note: Includes: 3 vesper stichera (mode 1) and another 3 stichera (mode 4) for the venerable, a staurotheothokion, a dismissal troparion (mode 4); there are 2 mixed Kanons, the 1st Kanon (mode 1) and the 2nd Kanon (mode 2) for the martyr, with all the odes in a row (with a heirmos, 3 troparia and a theotokion each), there are two sjedalni (1st - mode 8, 2nd for the venerable - mode 4), a doxa and a staurotheotokion after ode 3, a kontakion (mode 8) and an oikos after ode 6; in the end, there are a lighting sticheron and a theotokion only.

sampleText.head: Вь зі҃. с҃тго прорка ѡсиѥ и прѣподномчнка андрѣꙗ иже вь критѣ.

sampleText.incipit: Ꙗко б҃гог҃льникь вь истынѹ. ꙗко проркь ѡсиѥ

sampleText.head: дрѹг. канѡн прѣподбномꙋ
sampleText.incipit: Вь гльбынѣ потопи дрѣвлѥ фараѡнитьскаꙗ воиньства
Ꙗвльшаго се хса нас ради ѿ д҃вы

msItemStruct.title: Служба за апостол Лука
msItemStruct.note: Includes: 5 vesper stichera (mode 8), a doxa (mode 6) and a staurotheothokion, stichera aposticha (mode 4), a doxa (mode 6) and a dismissal troparion; the Kanon (mode 8) have all the odes (with a heirmos, 3 troparia and a theotokion), a sjedalen (mode 8), a doxa and a staurotheotokion after ode 3, a kontakion (mode 2) and an oikos after ode 6; in the end, there are a lighting sticheron, a theotokion, 3 praises stichera (mode 8), a doxa (mode 8) and a staurotheotokion, another doxa (mode 8) in praises stichera and a staurotheothokion

sampleText.head: Мсца тогжде вь иі҃. с҃тго апсла и ѥуглиста лѹкы.

sampleText.incipit: Пѣс вьдпоѥмь вси людыи чюдномѹ б҃ѹ ншемѹ

msItemStruct.title: Служба за пророк Йоил и св. Уар
msItemStruct.note: Includes: 3 vesper stichera (mode 8) for the prophet and another 3 stichera (mode 6) for the martyr, the doxa, the staurotheothokion and the dismissal troparions are only marked; the Office has 2 mixed Kanons; the 1st Kanon (mode 2) and the 2nd Kanon (mode 6) have all the odes in a row (in the 1st Kanon odes 1, 3, 4 and 5 have 3 troparia each, apart from the heirmos and the theotokion, odes 6, 7, 8, and 9 have an heirmos, 2 troparia and a theotokion each; in the 2nd Kanon each ode has a heirmos, 3 troparia and a theotokion, exept for the ode 9, which has 4 troparia), there are two sjedalni (1st - mode 8, 2nd - mode 1), a doxa and a staurotheotokion after ode 3, and no kontakion and oikos after ode 6; in the end, the lighting sticheron is only marked

sampleText.head: Мсца тогжде ѳі҃. с҃тго прорка иѡилꙗ. и с҃тго мчнка ѹара.

sampleText.incipit: Гредѣте людѥ поѥмь пѣс хсѹ б҃ѹ

sampleText.head: дрѹг. канѡн мчнкѹ
sampleText.incipit: Ꙗви се на высотѣ хсвы цр҃кве с҃те

msItemStruct.title: Служба за св. Артемий
msItemStruct.note: Includes: 3 vesper stichera (mode 4), a doxa (mode 2) and a staurotheothokion, another doxa (mode 6) in stichera aposticha and a staurotheotokion, a dismissal troparion (mode 4); the Kanon (mode 2) has all the odes (with a heirmos, 3 troparia and a theotokion), a sjedalen (mode 8), a doxa and a staurotheotokion after ode 3, a kontakion (mode 2) and an oikos after ode 6; in the end, there are a lighting sticheron, a doxa (mode 6) and a staurtheotokion

sampleText.head: Мсца тогжде. к҃. с҃тго великомчнка арѳемиꙗ.

sampleText.incipit: Вь гльбынѣ потопи дрѣв'лѥ фараѡнитьска воиньства
Подвигь мчнче добрыи ꙗко подвиза се

msItemStruct.title: Служба за св. Иларион Велики
msItemStruct.note: Includes: 3 vesper stichera (mode 4), a doxa (mode 2) and a staurotheothokion, another doxa (mode 8) in stichera aposticha and a staurotheotokion, a dismissal troparion (mode 8); the Kanon (mode 2) has all the odes (with a heirmos, 3 troparia and a theotokion), a sjedalen (mode 8), a doxa and a staurotheotokion after ode 3, a kontakion (mode 3) and an oikos after ode 6; in the end, there are a lighting sticheron, a doxa (mode 2) and a staurtheotokion

sampleText.head: Мсца тог. к҃а. прѣподбнаг. ѡ҃ца нашег илариѡна великаг.

sampleText.incipit: Вь гльбынѣ потопи дрѣвлѥ фараѡнитьска воиньства
Свѣтоносноѥ и свѣтовыд'ноѥ житѥ твоѥ бл҃жене

msItemStruct.title: Служба за св. Аверкий и Седемте Ефески Отроци
msItemStruct.note: Includes: 3 vesper stichera (mode 2) and another 3 stichera (mode 4), a doxa (mode 3) and a staurotheothokion, a dismissal troparion (mode 4) for the martyr; there are 2 mixed Kanons; the 1st Kanon (mode 2) and the 2nd Kanon (mode 8) have all the odes in a row (the odes in the 1st Kanon have 3 troparia each, apart from the heirmos and the theotokion; the 2nd Kanon have all the odes - with a heirmos, 2 troparia and a theotokion), there is no sjedalen after ode 3, but there is a kontakion (mode 4) for the martyr without an oikos; in the end, there are 2 lighting stichera and a theotokion

sampleText.head: Мсца тог. к҃в. вь с҃тых ѡ҃ца нашег авер'кыꙗ. и с҃тых. з҃. ѿрокь. иже вь ѥфесѣ.

sampleText.incipit: Гредѣте людѥ поѥмь пѣс хсѹ б҃ѹ

msItemStruct.title: Канон за св. Седем Ефески Отроци

sampleText.head: дрѹг. канѡн стым' ѿрокм'.

msItemStruct.title: Служба за апостол Яков, брат Господен
msItemStruct.note: Includes: 3 vesper stichera (mode 4), a doxa (mode 6) and a staurotheothokion, another doxa (mode 8) in stichera aposticha and a theotokion, as well as a dismissal troparion (mode 2); the Kanon (mode 4) have odes 1 and 3 only (with a heirmos, 3 troparia and a theotokion) and a sjedalen (mode 8)

sampleText.head: Мсца тог. к҃г. с҃тго апсла иꙗкова брат гснꙗ.

msItemStruct.title: Канон за апостол Яков, брат Господен
